markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Climbing Bolt](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2922)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 255 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 15 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** [bolt](/Weapons.aspx?ID=441)

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The shaft of this bolt is wrapped with fine twine. When the bolt strikes a solid surface, the twine unwinds and enlarges into a 50-foot-long rope, securely fastened to the surface the bolt struck. The rope can be pulled free with an Interact action and a successful DC 20 Athletics check.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Climbing Bolt

text: <title level="1" right="Item 4" pfs="Standard" > Climbing Bolt Source GM Core pg. 255 2.0 Price 15 gp Ammunition bolt --- The shaft of this bolt is wrapped with fine twine. When the bolt strikes a solid surface, the twine unwinds and enlarges into a 50-foot-long rope, securely fastened to the surface the bolt struck. The rope can be pulled free with an Interact action and a successful DC 20 Athletics check.
